column5: Went out for a few hours a couple weeks ago and I finally got the chance to put up a couple pics. got 1 walleye, 1 smallie, 1 perch and 1 pike. The perch and pike werent really worth a picture lol.  Got the walleye trolling old trusty, the only rig that seems to produce on that lake when the bite is slow and the bass was caught casting a crank into some heavy cover. That hog put up a solid fight too and took a few good runs. I forgot to rotate the pics.   The bass weighed exactly 5 3/4lbs and measured out to 20 3/4"  it's by far my PB
glad I have a laptop and could tilt it to see the pictures  LOL  nice fish
OUCH my neck!!!  Nice fish man....definitely worth tilting the head for
Your name is pike n, whities? Whats with the bass and eye? Dang I got a kink in my neck.  Nice fish.
Thanks for the replies!  Misfish, Ya Gotta switch 'er up once in a while.
now THAT'S a bass! congrats on the pb
